channel.title: Removing "attack" option in non-wildy
channel.description:
Hello everyone I own one of those old silab servers running off of the Allstarscape V2 base.
Players who are in non-wildy still have the attack option visible on other players when they right click on them. Though, if they select it nothing happens. I would like it removed if you are in a safe zone. Can anyone tell me how to do that?
I used the damn search button. I didn't find anything that worked for my server.
Just please provide me with a link to a tutorial if I missed it.
Thanks.... any help appreciated.
I have a 317 sendMessage server....

item.title: Removing "attack" option in non-wildy
item.dc:creator: @Marc8333 Marc8333
item.description:
@Marc8333 wrote:

I still need help…
